title: Swapcars
features1: •For Buyer: Booking products to buy and manage them (delete booking or pay). Products saved on the wishlist.
features2: •For Seller: Sell products, Add products to sell, and manage them (promote or delete). And see all own products.
technologies: •React Js, Tailwind, Firebase Authentication, JWT, React Router, React Query, React Hook FormNode Js, Express Js, Stripe MongoDB, etc.

title: Ankan
description: A personal Screen printing service selling web application.
features1: The owner of the website sells services here.
features2: •Buyers can buy services, Share Their feedback comment, and each buyer sees their own comments on the (My Review) page.
technologies: React Js, Tailwind, Firebase Authentication, React Router, React Query, React Hook Form, Node Js, Express Js, MongoDB, etc.

title: Pedagog
features1: •User see all services, see details each and every service, and if user want Get Premium that service.
technologies: •React Js, Tailwind, Firebase Authentication, React Router, Node Js, Express Js etc.
